item.title: Building my File Organizer: Part 1
item.description: Every day we download and create files, whether it be in Word, Excel, Notepad, etc. And, at least in my case, I always find myself leaving all my downloads in the default folder and all the files I create on the desktop with the promise of someday organizing them in a proper place. Although that day does come, because I like to keep my desktop organized, I think it’s a task that I shouldn’t have to do myself, but that I can automate.
